name: The Missing Chief
description:
Your great leader has gone missing on a simple recon mission he decided to go alone.

You HAVE to find him, and quickly. Without Chief, how can its great barbarian army take over a simple village?

Make your way through the weird non-barbarian village, and find what happened!

## How To Play:

- Attack with space
- Change walk direction with right mouse button
- Click on an object to collect or gain knowledge about it.

---Jam Version---
If your character refuses to move after an obstacle or an enemy has lost all its hearts, press Z. (You will lose a heart doing so)

This is a beat-them-up /point n' click mashup
